name: Dice Link
description:
A puzzle game where you have to draw lines to make chains of dice with the same symbol to score points. 

Each symbol has a unique power to increase your points with the roll of a special die also granting extra points for a certain symbol.

Aim to beat your high score and collect coins to buy different types of dice! Mix and match to find your favourite!

Made by @beautiepie1 and @ghostentity12 for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Sound from Zapsplat.com and Freesound.org
Music From PGN Music on YouTube
Fonts from Google Fonts
